com.bazaarvoice.bvandroidsdk

Class RecommendationView

  • java.lang.Object
    • BVView
      • com.bazaarvoice.bvandroidsdk.RecommendationView

  • public final class RecommendationView
extends BVView
    Bazaarvoice provided FrameLayout to contain a single Bazaarvoice recommended product. This view will allow Bazaarvoice to receive feedback about the users interaction with the Product in order to help influence future recommendations.
